<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Living Wildfire](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2982)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Living wildfires appear as humanoids made of living fire, burning everything they come across for the pure joy of it. Summoners take advantage of this joy and the elementals' explosive ends to spread destruction.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Living_Wildfire.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Living Wildfire](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2982)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=587" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=604" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 144 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +10; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), smoke vision

**Languages**
[Pyric](/Languages.aspx?ID=110)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** -2

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Smoke Vision** The living wildfire ignores the [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=62) condition from smoke.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +10 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 80
(explosion)

</row>

**Immunities**
bleed, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=696)

**Weaknesses**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=555) 5, [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=732) 5

**Explosion** ([fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604)) When the living wildfire dies, it explodes, dealing 3d6 fire damage to each creature in a 10-foot emanation (DC 19 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 50 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tendril +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d6+6 fire plus 2d4 [persistent fire](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29)

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fire mote +15 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 2d6+3 fire

**Spreading Flames** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) **Requirements** The living wildfire's last action was a Strike that dealt fire damage; **Effect** The fire flares, dealing 3d6 fire damage to each creature adjacent to that target with a DC 19 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-410" />
name: Living Wildfire
